ὕ remnant of a very corroded prefix

hüh & hott
over uber über bar < hyper hüpfer < super < duper

𓎛 𓃀 𓋴 𓋳 ὕφασμα húphasma ⇔ webs… weaves
𓎛 𓃀 𓋴 𓋳 ⋍> ϩⲉⲃⲥⲱ garment
𓎛 𓃀 𓋴 𓋳 پارچه ה pârče ⇔ parchment pergament περγαμηνή
𓎛 𓃀 𓋴 𓋳 कपड़ा kapṛās < कर्पट karpaṭa “garment” > carpet
𓎛 𓃀 𓋴 𓋳 •dhrps drapus drapes

ὕ had the same complicated history as related v,y 𐍁 < kp/kt ⇔ ϥ Ϥ 𐍅 < QVR/QTR
4 quarter part four tetra
